game.name: Zombie Vikings
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Zombie Vikings와 함께 죽도록 재미있는 모험을 떠나보세요. 부패하고 악취나는 패거리들이 장대한 세상을 누비면서 오딘의 잃어버린 눈을 되찾는 미션을 수행하게 됩니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the creators of indie smash hit Stick It to The Man! comes a new one to four-player co-op stab-you-in-the-gut-a-thon. Embark on a dead funny adventure with the Zombie Vikings. A putrid posse sent on a mission through the most epic of worlds to retrieve Odin’s lost eye.

reviewHighlights.text: 10/10 This game never stops making me smile. It's awesome.
Awesome arstyle, awesome music and pretty fun gameplay. I bet it would be even more fun with a friend, but alas, I don't have them... Oh well, it was...
